page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: The only school is over a 100 years old and situated outside Dendron.There are 28 children ranging from 4 to 11yrs with 2 teachers and an ancillary The school consists of 2 classrooms and a small hall.Meals are not served and packed lunches are brought by the children.Public transport is not available and pupils come by private car.The school has a computer and swimming lessons take place in the near by market town of Ulverston. Children are drawn from all over the area.The boys enjoy fishing in the local tarn and both boys and girls enjoy bike riding.There are few amenities for children;no shops,few clubs or societies in the area.An attractive beach lies along the eastern edge of the area.For senior school the children will go to Ulverston.
